name: ARSON (Linker)
description:
In order to obtain the mythical Flame of Life, you have travelled far and wide to its shrine. 

Now, to claim your prize, you must defeat 50 waves of guardians. Armed only with a powerful finger-gun and your wits, can you use your new control of fire to survive?

ARSON was made over the course of 10 days by Linker, aka Benjamin Maksym, for the Supersensory Megamix '21 Gamejam from August 20th to August 30th!
The jam can be found at the following link; please check out the other games if you feel so inclined!

https://itch.io/jam/supersensory-megamix

NOTE: This game make use of intense visual stimuli. If you're sensitive to bright flashes/colors on a dark background, and/or have a history of epilepsy, please use caution or avoid playing this game!
